UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Rational Design of Short Peptide Variants by Using Kunitzin-RE, an Amphibian-Derived Bioactivity Peptide, for Acquired Potent Broad-Spectrum Antimicrobial and Improved Therapeutic Potential of Commensalism Coinfection of Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Yang Z, He S, Wang J, Yang Y, Zhang L, Li Y, Shan A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli K99(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli 078(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>128µM),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2086(MIC=>128µM),Candida parapsilosis CGMCC 2.3989(MIC=>128µM),Candida tropicalis CGMCC 2.1975(MIC=>128µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data)
